original_title: Taylor Hawkins Drumming Masterclass with Steve Lamacq
overview: As drummer for the Foo Fighters for over 20 years, he's drummed his way through everything from Reading Festival, to Live Lounges to sell out stadium shows.  In this programme Taylor takes us on a guided tour of the drums, talking us through his childhood, his influences, the sounds of his drum kit, & what itâ€™s like drumming with both Alanis Morissette & Dave Grohl.
title: Taylor Hawkins Drumming Masterclass with Steve Lamacq
